title: FS: T206 Back Ghost - Howard. - SOLD
author: atx840

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Back Ghost - Howard. - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Looking to possibly move this one, only a dozen known examples of back ghosts.

Not a fan of "Open to offers" listings but I am open to offers :D. PM or email - [url]atx840@gmail.com[/url]

[IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8286/7784263236_226c7b246c_h.jpg[/IMG]

Definitely an interesting listing, thanks to those who sent in offers, the card has been sold. 

Congrats to the new owner!
